entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Test.SetAfterUse_Throws fails #101015
  • Inherited cast causes inliner to give up #101014
  • Linux huge memory consumption in .NET 8 #101013
  • Use $HOME/.local/share/Microsoft/User-secrets instead of $HOME/.microsoft/usersecrets/ in unix-like environments. #101012
  • Native AoT-compiled application fails with TypeInitializationException in latest daily build for .NET 9 #101010
  • DATAS is slower than Workstation GC on binary tree benchmarks #101006
  • Error: "Undefined symbols for architecture arm64: _SSLClose" when building projects to iPad #101005
  • [API Proposal]: New method HashSet<T>.Add that replaces an existing element if found #101003
  • JIT: Optimize "x & cns == cns" pattern #101000
    Future

Closed

  • [wasm] System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteLargeToStream #101016
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json failing some large file tests #59678
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #96546
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][AOT] Vector256ByteShiftLeftTest - Cannot select: 0x55ee6da14cd0: v16i8 #87423
    9.0.0
  • Mono WASM PInvoke Table generation does not handle backticks #99241
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Blazor/AOT crashing with preview1 - `Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:2443` #82481
    9.0.0
  • Regression in R2R compilation time #100995
  • Unable to Attach Visual Studio Debugger to Console App in SDK-style .NET Framework Project #100764
  • mono_os_mutex_destroy: pthread_mutex_destroy failed with "Device or resource busy" #99609
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics does not add my counter in the instrument in case of dotnet MAUI applicaiton when running android emulator #99822
  • AddIniFile Not found! #100992
  • Regex Capture gives IndexOutOfRangeException on `(?:){93}` #62094
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.FactorySha1Tests.HashAlgorithm_TransformBlockAndDispose_ConcurrentUseDoesNotCrashProcess fails #100983
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ArgumentNullException in SecurityIdentifier.CompareTo(null) #101002
    area-System.Security
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections

Merged

  • [wasm] Fix js string marshaling #100997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Search for seqpoints directly from jitinfo if it's not find on get_default_jit_mm #100978
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • Test to create ByRefLike instance through a generic parameter #101004
    test-enhancement, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Removing RUC from Default and Ambient attributes #100821
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Pass existing credscan suppression file to SDL scan #100976
    area-Infrastructure
  • Skip cleanup of eventpipe for mono to prevent crashes on shutdown #100938
    area-Tracing-mono, 9.0.0
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix erroneous readonly on a mutable struct #100996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: verify full profile consistency after importation #100869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NULL conversion warnings found in Alpine x64 Source-Build #100796
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix assert when using HashProviderCng concurrently #100989
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    arch-arm64, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [mono][android] Disable Linux Bionic libraries test runs due to failures #100980
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Track sideness of arrOp in GetCheckedBoundArithInfo #100968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fixed printing jump destinations in disassembler on release #100967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Channel.CreateUnboundedPrioritized #100550
    area-System.Threading.Channels
